mapper.update: update t_parklot_log set parklotNum = #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parkCentificateNum = #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, changeStatus = #{changestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, changeDate = #{changedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, changeContent = #{changecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, changeNote = #{changenote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where lotlogId = #{lotlogid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select lotlogId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, changeStatus, changeDate, changeContent, changeNote, carparkId from t_parklot_log where lotlogId = #{lotlogid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
